<script>
  var item = {{[GA4]주문서작성 - 상품 배열}};
  if(item){
    dataLayer.push({ ecommerce: null })        
    dataLayer.push({
      "event" : "begin_checkout",
      "ecommerce" : {
        "items" : item
      }
    })   
  } 
</script>

<script>
  window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
  window.dataLayer.push({
    "event" : "ga4_purchase",
    "ecommerce" : {
    "transaction_id" : {{[GA4]주문 완료 - 주문 번호}},
    "currency" : "KRW",
    "shipping": {{[GA4]주문 완료 - 배송비}},
    "value": {{[GA4]주문 완료 - 결제 금액}},
    "items" :{{[GA4]주문 완료 - 상품 배열}}
  }
  })     
</script>

<script>
    var result = {{[GA4]상품 상세 - 장바구니 배열}};  
  	if (result && result.items && result.items.length) {
      window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
      window.dataLayer.push({
        'event': 'add_to_cart',
        'ecommerce': {
          'items': result.items
        }
      });
    }
</script>

<script>
  var skp_c_element = {{Click Element}}.nextElementSibling.href;
  if ( skp_c_element && skp_c_element.indexOf('order_id') > -1 ) skp_order_id = skp_c_element.split('order_id=')[1].split('#')[0];
  
  if ( skp_order_id ) {
    window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
    window.dataLayer.push({
      event: 'ga4_refund',
      ecommerce: {
        transaction_id: skp_order_id
      }
    });
  }
</script>

<script>
  var item = {{[GA4]상품 상세 - 상품 배열}};
  if(item){
    window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
    window.dataLayer.push({
      'event': 'view_item', 
      'ecommerce': {         
        items : [item]
      }
    });
  }
</script>
